issue.title: mail.yahoo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mail.yahoo.com/n/list/folders=1&listFilter=ALL_INBOX/messages/420549?_src=ym&reason=myc&listFilter=ALL_INBOX](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yahoo.com%2Fn%2Flist%2Ffolders%3D1%26listFilter%3DALL_INBOX%2Fmessages%2F420549%3F_src%3Dym%26reason%3Dmyc%26listFilter%3DALL_INBOX) ### Comment > Today when I open yahoomail this image appears on the left of the screen and it appears to refresh multiple times after a few seconds or whenever I open a new email. I hope this helps I really enjoy your product and it usually works very well ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/bg1mq86udvs40cgsw8cwo0s8s44oo8dv3t1j0xrooo.png?nc=1)
